rigel.plugins.core.test.introspection.callback module

class rigel.plugins.core.test.introspection.callback.CallbackGenerator[source]

Bases: object

generate_callback_and(anterior: Callable[[Dict[str, Any]], bool], posterior: Callable[[Dict[str, Any]], bool]) → Callable[[Dict[str, Any]], bool][source]

Generate a base callback that verifies if both an anterior condition and a posterior condition return True.

Parameters:

  • anterior (Callable[[Dict[str, Any]], bool]) – The anterior function.

  • posterior (Callable[[Dict[str, Any]], bool]) – The posterior function.

Return type:

ROSCallbackType

Returns:

A function that returns True if both anterior and posterior functions also return True.

False otherwise.

generate_callback_different(field: List[str], value: Any) → Callable[[Dict[str, Any]], bool][source]

Generate a base callback function that verifies if a given ROS message field is different from a certain reference value.

Parameters:

  • field (List[str]) – The ROS message field.

  • value (Any) – The reference value.

Return type:

Callable[[Dict[str, Any]], bool]

Returns:

A function that returns True if the ROS message field is different from the reference value.

False otherwise.

generate_callback_equal(field: List[str], value: Any) → Callable[[Dict[str, Any]], bool][source]

Generate a base callback function that verifies if a ROS message field equals a certain reference value.

Parameters:

  • field (List[str]) – The ROS message field.

  • value (Any) – The reference value.

Return type:

Callable[[Dict[str, Any]], bool]

Returns:

A function that returns True if the ROS message field and the reference value are equal.

False otherwise.

generate_callback_greater(field: List[str], value: Any) → Callable[[Dict[str, Any]], bool][source]

Generate a base callback function that verifies if a given ROS message field is greater than a certain reference value.

Parameters:

  • field (List[str]) – The ROS message field.

  • value (Any) – The reference value.

Return type:

Callable[[Dict[str, Any]], bool]

Returns:

A function that returns True if the ROS message field is greater than the reference value.

False otherwise.

generate_callback_greater_than(field: List[str], value: Any) → Callable[[Dict[str, Any]], bool][source]

Generate a base callback function that verifies if a given ROS message field is greater than or equal to a certain reference value.

Parameters:

  • field (List[str]) – The ROS message field.

  • value (Any) – The reference value.

Return type:

Callable[[Dict[str, Any]], bool]

Returns:

A function that returns True if the ROS message field is greater than or equal to the reference value.

False otherwise.

generate_callback_iff(anterior: Callable[[Dict[str, Any]], bool], posterior: Callable[[Dict[str, Any]], bool]) → Callable[[Dict[str, Any]], bool][source]

Generate a base callback function that retrives the value of a posterior function in case an anterior function returns True.

Parameters:

  • anterior (Callable[[Dict[str, Any]], bool]) – The anterior function.

  • posterior (Callable[[Dict[str, Any]], bool]) – The posterior function.

Return type:

ROSCallbackType

Returns:

A function that retrives the value of a posterior function in case an anterior function returns True.

False otherwise.

generate_callback_lesser(field: List[str], value: Any) → Callable[[Dict[str, Any]], bool][source]

Generate a base callback function that verifies if a given ROS message field is lesser than a certain reference value.

Parameters:

  • field (List[str]) – The ROS message field.

  • value (Any) – The reference value.

Return type:

Callable[[Dict[str, Any]], bool]

Returns:

A function that returns True if the ROS message field is lesser than the reference value.

False otherwise.

generate_callback_lesser_than(field: List[str], value: Any) → Callable[[Dict[str, Any]], bool][source]

Generate a base callback function that verifies if a given ROS message field is lesser than or equal to a certain reference value.

Parameters:

  • field (List[str]) – The ROS message field.

  • value (Any) – The reference value.

Return type:

Callable[[Dict[str, Any]], bool]

Returns:

A function that returns True if the ROS message field is lesser than or equal to the reference value.

False otherwise.

generate_callback_vacuous() → Callable[[Dict[str, Any]], bool][source]

Generates a dummy callback function that simply returns True. This is useful to check if a message was received on a given topic despite its contents.

Return type:

ROSCallbackType

Returns:

A function that returns True for each return message.

process_binary_operator(operator: HplBinaryOperator) → Callable[[Dict[str, Any]], bool][source]

Retrieve a callback function that verifies the same condition as a HplBinaryOperator.

Parameters:

operator (HplBinaryOperator) – The HplBinaryOperator holding information regarding the callback logic.

Returns:

A ROS message handler callback function.

Return type:

ROSCallbackType

process_vacuous_truth() → Callable[[Dict[str, Any]], bool][source]

Retrieve a dummy callback function to be associated with HplVacuousTruth. HplVacuousTruth callbacks simply return True

Returns:

A ROS message handler callback function.

Return type:

ROSCallbackType

rigel.plugins.core.test.introspection.command module

class rigel.plugins.core.test.introspection.command.Command(type: CommandType, data: Dict[str, Any])[source]

Bases: object

A command to be exchanged between simulation requirement nodes.

class rigel.plugins.core.test.introspection.command.CommandBuilder[source]

Bases: object

A class to uniformize the creation of Command instances.

static build_rosbridge_connect_cmd(rosbridge_client: ROSBridgeClient) → Command[source]

Build a command that instructs requirement nodes to connect to a ROS bridge client.

Parameters:

rosbridge_client (ROSBridgeClient) – The ROS bridge client instance.

Returns:

A command holding necessary information.

Return type:

Command

static build_rosbridge_disconnect_cmd() → Command[source]

Build a command that instructs requirement nodes to disconnect from a ROS bridge client.

Returns:

A command holding necessary information.

Return type:

Command

static build_status_change_cmd() → Command[source]

Build a command that informs requirement nodes that a children node’s state has changed.

Returns:

A command holding necessary information.

Return type:

Command

static build_stop_simulation_cmd() → Command[source]

Build a command that informs manager that a simulation requirement has unsatisfied and there’s no need to continue assessment.

Returns:

A command holding necessary information.

Return type:

Command

static build_trigger_cmd(timestamp: float = 0.0) → Command[source]

Build a command that signals a node to stop listening for incoming messages once it gets satisfied.

Parameters:

timestamp (float, optional) – The timestamp for oldest received message to be considered satisfied.

Returns:

A command holding necessary information.

Return type:

Command

class rigel.plugins.core.test.introspection.command.CommandHandler[source]

Bases: object

A class for all objects that are able to handle commands and exchange command between themselves.

children: List[CommandHandler]
father: CommandHandler | None
handle_downstream_command(command: Command) → None[source]
handle_upstream_command(command: Command) → None[source]
send_child_downstream_cmd(child: CommandHandler, command: Command) → None[source]

Send a downstream command to a single child node.

Parameters:

  • child (CommandHandler) – The child node.

  • command (Command) – The downstream command to send to the child node.

send_downstream_cmd(command: Command) → None[source]

Send a downstream command to all children nodes.

Parameters:

command (Command) – The downstream command to send to all children nodes.

send_upstream_cmd(command: Command) → None[source]

Send a upstream command to the father node.

Parameters:

command (Command) – The upstream command to send to the father node.

rigel.plugins.core.test.introspection.parser module

class rigel.plugins.core.test.introspection.parser.SimulationRequirementsParser[source]

Bases: object

A class to parse simulation requirements. All simulation requirements must be declared in the HPL language.

parse(hpl_requirement: str) → SimulationRequirementNode[source]

Parse a single simulation requirement. All simulation requirements must be expressed in the HPL language.

Parameters:

hpl_requirement (str) – A simulation requirement expressed in the HPL language.

Returns:

A tree of simulation requirements.

Return type:

SimulationRequirementsManager

Bases: HplAstVisitor

A class to extract simulation requirements from the nodes of a transformed HPL AST.

Extract information from a node of type HplPattern.

Parameters:

node (HplPattern) – The HPL AST node.

rigel.plugins.core.test.introspection.strategy module

class rigel.plugins.core.test.introspection.strategy.AssessmentStrategy[source]

Bases: object

Base class for all assessment strategies.

Variables:

finished – Flag that indicates when to stop assessing incoming ROS messages.

assess(field: Any, operator: str, value: Any) → None[source]
finished = False
class rigel.plugins.core.test.introspection.strategy.SingleMatchAssessmentStrategy[source]

Bases: AssessmentStrategy

A requirement assessment strategy that consists in finding a single ROS message that satisfies a given condition.

assess(field: Any, operator: str, value: Any) → None[source]

Assess if a ROS message satisfies a given condition. Once a message is found to do that, no more messages are assessed.

Parameters:

  • field (Any) – The ROS message field.

  • operator (str) – The comparison to make and that must be satisfied.

  • value (Any) – The reference value.

rigel.plugins.core.test.introspection.strategy.assess_condition(field: Any, operator: Any, value: Any) → bool[source]

Compare the value of a given ROS message field with a certain reference value.

Parameters:

  • field (Any) – The ROS message field.

  • operator (str) – The comparison to make.

  • value (Any) – The reference value.

Returns:

The result of the comparison between the given ROS message field and the

provided reference value. :rtype: bool

rigel.plugins.core.test.introspection.strategy.assess_different(field: Any, value: Any) → bool[source]

Verify if a given ROS message field is different from a certain reference value.

Parameters:

  • field (Any) – The ROS message field.

  • value (Any) – The reference value.

Returns:

True if the ROS message field is different from the reference value.

False otherwise. :rtype: bool
